name: Water Surfing: Car Racing Chal
description:
Beach Water Car Racing Challenge is an ultimate addition to water surfing car games with most realistic experience of car simulation in real 3D mode. Enjoy the furious rides over the endless water tracks while performing some insane drifts and acrobatic stunts. Avoid all the obstacles and hurdles and keep an eye on the arrowhead to find out the next checkpoints
• Furious and action-packed water racing game ever.
• Amazing sand beach terrain and mountain views.
• Detailed views and textures with supreme quality graphics.
• Different hurdles to cross and off-road stunt car racing game.
• Multi-level gameplay with most difficult off-road racing challenges.
